original_text: He trusted in the Lord God of Israel; so that after him was none like him among all the kings of Judah, nor any that were before him.
korean_text: 히스기야가 이스라엘 하나님 여호와를 의지하였는데 그의 전후 유다 여러 왕 중에 그러한 자가 없었으니

sentences.original_text: He trusted in the Lord God of Israel
so that after him was none like him
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 따라 그와 같은 자가 없었으니

sentences.original_text: among all the kings of Judah
nor any that were before him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 전에도 그와 같은 자가 없었더라
